Monarch Grove Winery.knownFor: “ Wine tasting near beach ” Reviewed September 2, 2014 Yesterday, my friend and I stopped at the Monarch Grove Wine Tasting Room. The room is clean and very pleasant. It's situated at the old railroad terminal in Grover Beach and close to Pismo and Grover beaches. Monarch Grove Winery offers wine tastings, as well as, vinegar and olive oil tastings.
